Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel before or after a cruise”
Reviews.Author: evillaManila
Reviews.Content: stayed casa sant andrea prior taking cruise venice hotel perfect near people mover station cruise passengers piazzale roma buses stop vaporetto stations train station basic clean comfortable building expected bathroom outdated newly remodelled clean breakfast simple filling plentiful hotel improve lighting stair landing elevator luggages bit difficult operate staff available help recommend hotel especially people looking short stay venice prior taking cruise

Reviews.Title: “Room with character”
Reviews.Author: SurreyDoris
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights size bathroom double single bed wardrobes separated separated couldnt lay bed chatting nice original beams exposed brickwork warm breakfast ample replenished time staff helpful cleaned daily clean towels bus aiport hotel easy bus station water bus stop corner hotel st marks square stops en route main station 5 mins walk handy moving location booked walking tour gondola ride separate advance travel saved wasting time saved money gondola ride worth penny â£100 3 comfy shoes rain mac advisable whilst plenty stop fooddrink

Reviews.Title: “Good quality 2 * hotel.”
Reviews.Author: SaraJWorcester
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 hotel double 3 nights april 2012 impressions comfortable impeccably clean ideal couple planning base didwe late time venice 15 minute walk san marco accessible restaurants nice quiet despite bus station wi fi available breakfast fairly basic continental style adequate sample local delicacies explore wonderful city save money visitor tax check adaptor extension lead handy charging phones cameras etc definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Very good quality for a 2-star accomodation”
Reviews.Author: DavideTorino79
Reviews.Content: 2star hotel offers qualityprice ratio basic comfortable clean hotel close train station takes 5 minutes foot ferry stop murano doorstep round corner piazzale roma ferry boats city centre breakfast staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel-Worth The Stay”
Reviews.Author: exe1
Reviews.Content: expecting luxuary hotel cheap comfortable nice hotel look hotel staff friendly helpful nice comfortable clean beds comfortable bathroom warm breakfast basic nice filling close major water taxi stop bus station mainland rail stn walking distance base explore venice

Reviews.Title: “Very nice, brilliant stay but not so happy about the staff..”
Reviews.Author: David H
Reviews.Content: nice clean spacey food location couple minutes walk piazzale roma grand canal cruise boat docks view front watched tourist night cruise boats huge screen staff helpful grumpy rude english italian dont amazing building looks little rough outside nicely updated inside value location

Reviews.Title: “Not a hotel for the marathon”
Reviews.Author: LuLuHade
Reviews.Content: dont normally write reviews share experience assist travellers reason trip venice participate marathon looking relatively cheap hotel spend couple nights expect review short sweet recommend hotel price location couple stay unpleasant issues related 1 lack hot water 2 temperature 1 daily shower sets day morning marathon woke 630 am hot water cold start day returned marathon day hot water called reception fix issue waited 40 minutes 10 minutes told wait tested water cold raising issue reception showering floor hotel apologetic 2the cold matter heating requested blanket told wasnt hotel spent night marathon little restless cold start waking morning catch flight london venice fair hotel supply extra blanket night request inconvenience staff conclusion hotel price location breakfast expect provide hot water minimum

Reviews.Title: “Best place for cruise ship travel”
Reviews.Author: veniceMed2011
Reviews.Content: fantastic clean inexpensive quiet located near ideal transportation getting venice airport cruise ships personnel speak english plus able hotel steps miracle venice separate shared modern bath breakfast provided drink orange juice reviews warned mediocre tvs

Reviews.Title: “Great value basic base in Venice!”
Reviews.Author: Cropton100
Reviews.Content: hotel 10 mins walk railway station 5 mins bus station main vaporetta stop facilites basic clean hot water personally dont breakfast basic ok price paid central venice dont fare central london quiet safe secure staff helpful leaving bags stay getting venice extremely confusing recommend travel card purchased time found buying ticket valid 23 euros brilliant value convenient freedom hopping wherever choose

Reviews.Title: “Decent budget hotel / Hostel”
Reviews.Author: Lightning_Trip
Reviews.Content: bit hidden gem getting past paths venice close train station water bus stops helpful staff clean bathroom separate chose bathroom clean usual shower shared outside bedroom requiring key building inside looks venice

Reviews.Title: “value for money”
Reviews.Author: tutes
Reviews.Content: hotel value money terms friendly staffit easy bus station vaporetti quiet clean helpful friendly staffthe basic inside look onto price finethe breakfast ham door bells ring morning usually awake anywaywe definitely recommend short staynot stay balcony bit luxury

Reviews.Title: “A pleasant surprise!”
Reviews.Author: karen56Durham
Reviews.Content: dreading stay night hotel read reviews tripadvisor booking website im people expect 2 star hotel id anticipated breakfast choice fresh rolls cheese jams etc freshly drinks served extremely pleasant lady hotel spotless bathroom found staff pleasant courteous convenient station piazzale roma definitely stay looking 2 star hotel price venice excellent minor drinks vending machine register coins correctly paying double amount bottle water duty manager wasnt helpful maybe due language limitations minor contrary reviews found hotel quiet
